# Font Table Index Values

**API Collection**

Possible values for an index into a font table.

## Overview

See [doc://com.apple.coregraphics/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGFontIndex].

## Constants

- **kCGFontIndexMax**: The maximum allowed value of a [doc://com.apple.coregraphics/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGFontIndex].
- **kCGFontIndexInvalid**: An invalid font index (a value which never represents a valid glyph).
- **kCGGlyphMax**: The maximum allowed value of a [doc://com.apple.coregraphics/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGGlyph].

## Working with Font Tables

- **tableTags**: Returns an array of tags that correspond to the font tables for a font.
- **table(for:)**: Returns the font table that corresponds to the provided tag.
- **Obsolete Font Table Index Values**: Deprecated values for an index into a font table.
